edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view
Class View

java.lang.Object
  BaseSimpleGame
      edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.View

public class View
extends BaseSimpleGame

Defines the view of the system in a model-view-controller architecture.

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu), caprea

scaleMorph

public void scaleMorph(NeuronMorphologyView morph,
                       OMTVector constraint)
Scales the morophology in the dimensions of constraint

Parameters:
morph - the item(s) to be rotated
constraint - the dimensions that the morphology will be scaled in

rotateMorph

public void rotateMorph(NeuronMorphologyView morph,
                        OMTVector constraint)
Changes the rotation of a morphology based on changes from the mouse movement

Parameters:
morph - the item(s) to be rotated
constraint - the axis (or axes) on which to rotate the object. For example, if constraint is (1,0,0) the object will rotates about it's own X axis (not the world's X axis)

moveMorph

public void moveMorph(NeuronMorphologyView morph,
                      OMTVector constraint)
Changes the local translation of a morpholgy in the scene based on changes from the mouse movement The dimensions of freedom allow the 2D movement of the mouse to map to the 3D movement intended

Parameters:
constraint - Specifies what dimensions to allow movement based on mouse input. Will typically range from (0,0,0) to (1,1,1). Where (1,1,0) corresponds to 2D movement on the current X,Y plane
